resources.string: Is SD-Card correct configured in the settings menu?
Is the Internet connected...?? If yes, the radio stream might not be reachable at the moment.
Do you want to listen in the background or should I stop playing and recording?
Thanks to rakudave for the perfect GUI !!
This radio is only on air when there is a live broadcast! Inform yourself on the homepage about the next live streams.

Already donated? This app is free and will remain free! If you like the app or if you are bored about the ads so please do not hesitate to donate. All donors with CHF/EUR 2.00 or more will receive a personal \'Anti-Ads-Key\'. With it you can enjoy RadioRec+ without any advertisement! Please leave you email after donation.

After your donation you should receive an email within a few days with the \'anti ads key\'. If you don\'t receive your key please drop me an email (androider@wolke7.net).\n\nEnter anti ads key here and press Save.
Your recorded files are on your SD-Card.\nYou\'ll find them in the default directory "RadioRecorder". In the Settings you can change this path.
Is your station or a feature missing? Or do you have any comment? Click this email address and share your comment with me. \n\n--- androider@wolke7.net ---
How much data is used while listening with RadioRec+ ??

Answer: Around 60MB/h. The Radio stations are streaming with 128kbps. So calculate : 128\'000 Bit/s : 8 = 16\'000 Byte/s. It is 57.6 MB/hour (16\'000x3200 : 1\'000\'000). Tip: Use WLAN, so data consumption is no problem :-)
By default the MP3 recordings are stored on the SD-Card in the path \"sdcard/RadioRecorder\" \n. Here you can change this path. \nAttention: The path to the storage location must match exactly!
With this 3 options you can set the Wireless behavior. Attention: If \'WiFi always on\' your battery will be used more. Switch it off here or at the advanced wireless settings to save power.
Keep WiFi on when plugged in
Automatically off when screen turns off
Donate via PayPal or credit card
Simply send some BTC to the following address and drop me an email.
Donation not possible at the moment
The Market billing service is not available at this time. Please try later or donate by PayPal or credit card.
RadioRec+ cannot connect to the market. Your market version is out of date or I cannot find the market app. \nPlease donate by using PayPal or credit card.
Before writing the mp3 file the data is ongoing stored in a buffer. Here you can configure the buffer size. If you have no problem with recording or you\'re not sure leave it 8192 bytes.
ERROR: Enter a number between\n0 - 1000000 (1 million) !
